cases.title: The State vs. GIF Pronunciation
cases.summary: The controversy over the correct pronunciation of the popular image format GIF has escalated into a full-blown court case after a heated argument at a tech conference.
cases.details: Dr. Samuel Lang insists that GIF should be pronounced with a soft 'G', likening it to the sound of 'Jif', while Emily Rogers contends that it should have a hard 'G', like 'Gift'.
evidence: Common usage in the tech community for the hard 'G'

witness.name: Steve Wilhite
witness.testimony: I created it, and it's pronounced 'Jif'.

cases.title: Cats vs Dogs: The Ultimate Pet Showdown
cases.summary: A neighborhood dispute over whether cats or dogs are better pets turned into a brawl at the local pet park, landing the matter in court.
cases.details: Karen Smith argues that cats are independent and low-maintenance, while Mark Johnson claims dogs offer unmatched loyalty and companionship.
evidence: Cats are self-sufficient and require less attention
Dogs provide loyalty, companionship, and security

witness.name: Dr. Jessica Brown
witness.testimony: Cats are self-sufficient and require less attention.

cases.title: The People vs. Pineapple Pizza
cases.summary: A culinary feud has erupted after a renowned Italian chef was insulted by the addition of pineapple to his traditional pizza at a prestigious food festival.
cases.details: Chef Giovanni Rossi declares that pineapple on pizza is an abomination, while Chef Lani Kalua defends it as a delightful combination of sweet and savory.
evidence: Pineapple on pizza disrespects Italian heritage
Pineapple adds a unique flavor that many people love

witness.name: John Smith
witness.testimony: Pineapple brings a unique flavor that many people love.

cases.title: DC fans vs Marvel enthusiasts
cases.summary: Recent Comic-Con panel spiraled out of control, leading to a lawsuit over which universe offers better superheroes.
cases.details: DC fans boasted that their villians, have entire fan clubs, while Marvel's are just a bunch of misunderstood anti-heroes. Marvel's backers responded with claims their heros saved Universe from Thanos, while DC can't handle even one Joker...Aparently there is more our witness overheard while on duty
evidence: Joker is still alive, thriving, gets a new film every year
Marvel heroes have day jobs! DC's heroes are part-time billionaires or aliens.
Latest Joker movie had 89% audience votes
Marvel's avengers united several times, DC is still trying to figure out how to assemble a team
DC's heroes feel dark and brooding, while Marvel's are like a high school reunion.

witness.name: Jake Bleck
witness.testimony: Witnessed hot debate between DC and Marvel die hard fans in the lavatory, with a lot of beans spilled by both sides

cases.title: The People vs. Microwave Tea
cases.summary: The trial began after a horrified tea connoisseur, Emily Green, witnessed her neighbor, John Doe, warming up tea in a microwave at a neighborhood potluck.
cases.details: Emily argues that microwaving tea destroys its delicate flavors, while John defends his method as convenient and practical for modern lifestyles.
evidence: Microwaving tea destroys its delicate flavors
Microwaving tea is practical for modern lifestyles

witness.name: Mr. Chen
witness.testimony: Proper tea brewing requires patience and care.
